attributes.action: To stop teaching lgbtq in schools for religions that don’t allow
attributes.background: To stop teaching lgbtq across Yorkshire for those religions who do not allow it.because if they do there will be hate against schools

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about how to deliver Relationships Education, Relationships and Sex Education (RSE) and Health Education are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament, but we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Remove LGBT content from the Relationships Education curriculum: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/630932
